sources.title: The Wild Party 1929 Colorized
sources.description: This movie became Public Domain on 1 January 2025. Clara Bow's first Talkie movie, in which she plays a party-loving college student who falls for her professor (Fredric March). It was also the first use of a 'boom mic', created by the movie's director Dorothy Arzner by placing a mic on the end of a fishing pole. IMDB page: https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0020590/reference/ Colorized using DeOldify and AVISynth. (Note: Although the movie is public domain, the colorization is copyright by me. My colorized movies are freely uploaded for free personal use only. Please don't put them on your own YouTube channel and monetize them. The one exception is Lost n Found Films on YouTube, who I authorise to use my colorizations. Thanks.)
